game.name: Gobblet
game.pieces: Each player has two large and two small pieces.
game.tomove: Players may either place a piece or move a piece.
game.towin: To get three pieces in a row.
game.rules: The players each have two large and two small pieces on a 3x3 board. On each turn a player can either place a piece or move a piece. In moving a piece, a large piece can go over a smaller piece, but not vice versa. The game ends when one player has three in a row of his/her pieces.

variant.name: Misere
variant.description: To force your opponent into getting three of his pieces in a row.
